ema.description: A pie chart that shows the condition of materials across entities and activities based on the current stock status:
detail: Normal: Stock level is between minimum and maximum thresholds
Below Min: Stock level is below the minimum threshold but above zero
Above Max: Stock level exceeds the maximum threshold
Out of Stock: Stock level is zero

temperature.description: A pie chart that displays the condition of vaccine refrigerators based on the latest temperature status:
detail: Normal: Temperature is within the defined lower and upper limits
Low: Temperature is below the lower limit
High: Temperature is above the upper limit
Unknown: No temperature data received from the logger

activity.description: A horizontal stacked bar chart that shows the distribution of entities based on user activity status within the last 7 days from the selected “As of Date”:

no_access_asset_management: You do not have access to that page
